review: My son needed a Capo, expensive at music  shop where he takes lessons.  At Amazon found what he wanted at reasonable price.
While ordering a guitar case, the guitar strap popped up and I could not pass up the deal.  I found it price inexpensive and the quality was very good.
I shopped around local music shops and was discouraged with the prices. Checked out Amazon and was a little skeptical with the reasonable price, but pleasantly surprised when we received it.
Always looking for reasonable pricing.  The picks were as good as advertised online, it met our expectations and pricing was good.
Went shopping at the local music store for a guitar case, too expensive.  Went to Amazon found a great case, great price and free stand.
